title: Flipped Learning-Based Pharmacy Therapeutics Expert Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental pharmaceutical knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Advanced learning program for current practitioners, targeting expertise enhancement for pharmaceutical department personnel within corporations.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the rationale for selecting gastrointestinal and hepatic disease treatments with over 85% achievement in a flipped learning environment.
Learners solve medication scenario-based decision-making problems with 90% accuracy based on pre-learning materials.
Learners actively participate in discussion activities incorporating peer feedback at least four times to enhance complex case analysis skills.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
